name: Not Pong (WastedHyena)
description:
Have you ever thought to yourself "What if Pong would have terrible physics?", No? Well I did.

Introducing, 'NOT Pong'. Feel real freedom with being able to throw your paddles around the field. Grab a friend, smush yourselves in front of one keyboard, and paddle away!

This game requires another player. Well... it doesn't, but playing as 2 players alone isn't very fun.
